name: Project Shadow
description:
CONTROLS

W/A/S/D - Move

F - Toggle flashlight

Shift - Sprint

Escape the maze! Some walls are not what they seem... Can you use your flashlight and wit to escape your own shadow that follows your every movement?

This game was created in 24 hours for Oregon State University's Game Development Club Game Jam 2022. Prompt: "You Are Your Own Enemy."

Disclaimers:

- This is our first game. It is not a complete product.

- If you die, you'll have to restart the game manually.

- You win when you find the white light at the exit of the maze.

CREDITS

Game created by Collision Studio: Max F, Jacob H, Trenton T, Joel V

Jacob H. - Assets, Programming, Concept

Joel V. - Programming

Max F. - Programming

Trenton T. - Map design, Concept
